name: Ghost Game
description:
Ghost game is a game of exploration. Walk around the world and have fun!

Help:

Look around with your mouse.

Use wasd or arrow keys to move.

Hold left Shift for running.

Press space to jump.

Click on the ghosts until they disappear to destroy them.

We hope you like the game ☺

Patch 26/07/2017: Fixed the corrupt textures.
